title: Sacred Heart blackletter, similar to Fette Fraktur
content:
I am looking for the font that looks like Fette Fraktur on the left.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080904220834im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/sacred_4135.gif)

 [‹ (x) Donovan Purcell "Cambridge Stone" book cover serif type - similar to Octavian {Florian}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080904220834/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38361 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Imperial formal script - Ariston {Rainer} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080904220834/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38356 "Go to next forum topic")
author: signs79
